Hi all, I’m just trying to work out a new workflow for our agency to use with clients, and after a bit of advice… I wanted to clone the boilerplate, update to include our normal development extras for example Bootstrap etc. then add to our clients sites, and create child themes, so we can keep the parent theme updated from the boilerplate clone.

Firstly is this the nest workflow? and if so how would this be best achieved?
